pages.text: The $(l:https://botaniamod.net/index.html)Lexica Botania$(/l) has a wealth of information. However, your Lexica Botania book may be even better for in-game help.$(br2)If you still need help, then you can join their $(l:https://discord.gg/vm)discord$(/l).$(br2)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/botania)Curseforge page$(/l)
